content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-4.5, 23.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -4.5, 23.0)
- Offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5)
- Steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5)
- Pipe groups connected to the boiler (various positions)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace (position 5, 5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to power connections
- Ensure that all power-generating entities (like steam engines) are properly connected to a power network. Check the nearby electric poles and their connections.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to fluid connections
- Verify that all pipes are properly connected and that the required fluids are present in the system to avoid issues with fluid transfer.
